Question: Throughout her life, this person denied that Mortensen was her father.
Hints: This person was pleased with his images of her, later telling him, "You made a palace out of my patio.".
In 1999, this person was ranked as the sixth-greatest female star of all time by the American Film Institute.
By this time, this person had only completed one film, Bus Stop, under her four-picture contract with 20th Century Fox.
